title: Gluten free banana, oat and chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['3 ripe bananas, mashed', '180g gluten free oats, pulverised in a food processor', '250g smooth peanut or almond butter', '1 egg, room temperature', '1 orange, zested', '80ml milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '3/4 teaspoon baking powder', '30g walnuts or other nuts, chopped', '175g pitted dates, pulverised in a food processor', '100g chocolate chips']
